title: El Diablo Recipe
full_text:
El Diablo Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
blanco
tequila
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
lime juice
from
1
whole
lime
1/2
ounce
high quality
triple sec
1/2
ounce
Pimm's No. 1
Ginger ale
Directions
Combine tequila, lime juice, triple sec, and Pimm’s in a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake until well chilled, about 20 seconds. Strain contents into a Collins glass filled with ice and top with ginger ale.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
